name: Real-Time Network Monitoring & Alerting Platform
desc: End-to-end network monitoring solution with real-time data collection, alerting, and interactive analytics dashboard for comprehensive infrastructure insights.

name: Legacy Application Modernization
desc: Developed AI-powered platform using Langchain to automate PHP-to-NodeJS conversions with secure file uploads.

name: Pi-hole Network Ad-Blocking & Privacy Solution
desc: Configured Pi-hole with Unbound DNS for network-wide ad/malware blocking. Set up Raspberry Pi OS, Achieved ~90% ad-blocking.

name: Aruba S2500-48P Switch Lab & Configuration
desc: Hands-on lab with Aruba S2500-48P (48 PoE ports). Configured VLANs, trunk ports, PoE setups, Aruba CLI, role-based access, and QoS.

name: Enterprise VoIP Migration & ATA Deployment
desc: Migrated legacy PBX to Cisco VoIP using ATAs. Configured IP phones, optimized QoS for voice traffic, and maintained endpoint inventory.

name: Campus Network Modernization & WiFi Optimization
desc: Upgraded campus access switches and fiber uplinks. Conducted WiFi surveys, optimized AP placement. Validated Cisco configurations.

name: 10 Days of Code - VVCE
desc: Letter of Appreciation from Vidyavardhaka College of Engineering Mysuru for #10daysofcodevvce organized in association with GitHub and HackerRank. Great event for community engagement and skill development.
